Then you look at your surroundings getting bigger and then you realize that you're shrinking as well. The human race was shrinking. As you scream, you get smaller and smaller until you stop shrinking and you become 1/8th of an inch tall. You could not believing your new surroundings. Then you hear stomping right behind you and you turn to see a hoof the size of a small town. Whatever shrank every human on the planet had no effect on the cows. But then you hear something weird. "Howdy there little man," says a female voice in a Southern accent. "Looks like we're the mistresses of the farm now." Now the cows were talking? What was going on. And more importantly, which of your city sized cows was speaking to you?
134.title: Big Bovines

choices: "No problem! Just hop on my head and relax, little guy!"
1341.content:
"Mornin', Boss! Though I guess I'm the boss around here now, huh?" You crane your head upwards, following the cheerful drawl. You follow a brown leg that looks as dense as a skyscraper, and ten times as tall. Your eyes eventually rest on a massive, tan bovine face hovering over you...It's Lily! Despite how impossible--and terrifying--this whole situation is, seeing the friendly cow calms you down a bit, even if she's now a lumbering colossus. Not knowing what else to do, you wave your arms and call out to her.

         "Lily! Down here, it's me!" You shout at the top of your lungs, ready to bolt if she doesn't see you. One wrong step, and you'd be reduced to paste under her hoof.
The titanic Jersey cattle answers you with a giggle.
"Already see you, little guy. No need to go and act a fool to get Miss Lily's attention." She leans down and nuzzles you, knocking you on your rump. "Sorry, but I can't lick ya like I usually do--I'd end up eatin' ya by accident!" She chuckles merrily, her sudden human speech matching her bovine personality to a "T".

         You pick yourself off the floor, trying to stay composed. Lily may have been affectionate, but at your current size you were essentially defenseless. Despite Lily's lighthearted banter, the image of you being slurped up and swallowed whole makes you cringe. "Lily...what the hell is going on? Why is...everything but you so huge? Why are you talking all of a sudden--no offense--how is any of this even possible?!?" You throw up your arms with a shout, starting to panic. Before you can rant further, Lily rather loudly clears her throat, cutting you off.

         "Easy there, buddy. Calm down before ya blow a fuse, alright?" She drawls, sounding both amused and concerned. "I don't have a clue about any of that...not yet, at least. But standin' around yellin' isn't gonna solve anything, right? What we need to do is go 'round the barn and get the lay of the land, so to speak. See if anything else besides you and your folks got tiny. Sound good?" Lily cocks her head and gives you a gentle smile, succeeding in calming you down.

         You take a deep breath. "Okay... *sigh* Okay. Right; good idea. Would you mind...er, giving me a ride Lily? I can't exactly cover much ground like...this." Damn, it feels weird asking a cow permission to ride her. But you don't want to risk antagonizing Lily, not even a little bit. Plus, it just seemed polite. And when things got this screwed-up, you could at least rely on manners being a constant.

         Lily smiles wider, and answers...
1341.title: Jersey Angel? Maybe...

choices: Too late--Lilly sits on you! (Unharmed, but pinned)

13412.content:
Lily's cheerful grin suddenly melts into a smirk. "Not just yet, Boss," she purrs as she takes a step towards you. Her hoof shakes the ground, and you instinctively flinch back and begin to retreat, knees knocking. Lily's smirk widens as she continues, "I'll help you check out the farm, don't you worry...but first, you and me have to settle accounts."
You gulp. This can't be good. "W-what do you mean, Lily?" You ask, trying to keep the shiver out of your voice.
Lily snorts. "Remember last week, when those kiddies came over for a field trip?"

         You blink at the memory: the previous week, a bus-full of kids from the local elementary school had, indeed, come over for a field trip. As you remember it, it was an all-around success: the kids had a blast, you got a bonus in your allowance for acting as their tour guide/chaperon, and your parents had even scored a sweet deal to teach the school's new botany class after the summer break. "I don't understand, Lily!" You yelp, still backing away as the gargantuan Jersey cow slowly advances. "Nothing went wrong...what are you mad about?"

         Lily sighs. "Oh, everything went right...'cept one of the kiddies had the bright idea to go an' sit on my back while I was takin a nap! Yanked me out of a real nice dream, and hurt my back somethin' fierce. Girl must have plopped onto a pulled muscle or somethin'. Either way, you didn't try to stop her, Boss!" She leans in close to you, almost touching her truck-sized nose to your chest.

         You put up your hands, stumbling backwards. "Lily...I'd forgotten about your pulled muscle..I thought it had already healed up! And you didn't look like you were hurting or anything, so I never suspected anything was wrong!" You take a few more steps back...
And soon find that you can't move your feet. "What...?" You look down, and discover that you've wandered onto a stray sheet of fly paper, the sticky pad looking the size of a tennis court at your scale. You make experimental jerks with your legs, but you can't even lift your feet.

         Lily giggles like a naughty kid, and when you look up her smirk makes it obvious...she lead you onto the fly paper! What was that cow going to do? "Oh, I can understand your reasons, Boss," Lily says casually, still in your face. Without warning she purses her lips and blows a quick puff of air at you. The sudden gust is enough to topple you onto your back, stuck firmly to the adhesive fly paper. You try to struggle, but to no avail--the most you manage is ripping your shirt down the seams on the sides. Lily cracks another giggle, the she smirks wider than even before. "Like I said, I can understand you reasons...but that li'l girl still gave me a sore back when she sat on me, even though she didn't mean it."

         To your horror, Lily starts turning around, presenting her gargantuan bovine rear to you. She looks back at you and winks. "Still, just to make things even...I'll show you just how unpleasant bein' sat on can be." She starts to slowly lower her rump, its shadow quickly covering you. You frantically renew your struggles against the fly paper.
"P-Please Lily!" You call out. "I'm sorry, alright?!? I didn't know about that...for God's sakes, you're going to crush me to death!!" You all but shout, going wide-eyed as her plump tan rear continues its descent.

         Lilly sighs. She speaks in comforting tones, her previous mischief gone from her voice. But her rump continues its descent regardless. "Take it easy, Boss. I promise I won't squish ya or break anything...you'll be pinned, and it sure as hell won't be pleasant, but you'll still be alive and kickin' when I get off of ya. That's the Gospel truth."

         Despite Lily's reassurances, you aren't going to just take your chances with a city-sized cow not crushing you into an unrecognizable paste. With frantic speed, you continue your struggles against the fly paper's sticky surface...

14112.content:
Julia wakes up in her bed, as normal. The clock says that it is 11:00 AM, typical for the young teen on a summer day. She has white skin, long and straight brown hair, and is tall for her age, about 5'9" (180cm). Swinging her legs over to the side of the bed, she slips her bare feet (size 10 if you were wondering) into her slippers, stretches and yawns, her skinny body reaching upwards and away from her short nightshirt, and then heads downstairs for breakfast.

When she gets downstairs, she immediately notices that her parents and her older brother are not already stirring. She gets out a box of cereal, a bowl, and the jug of milk for herself, and then returns upstairs to see if her family is just sleeping in and decided to leave her out of the awesome sleep-fest.

Empty. Every room...? Julia looks out the window, and sees that both her parents' cars are in the driveway, so they should still be home. She goes back downstairs to finish preparing her breakfast. Sugary cereal in first, piled nicely near the top of the bowl, and then a ton of milk to push it all right up to the brim. She takes the bowl to the table, grabbing a spoon in the process.

It may be eerily quiet, and her family might be missing, but Julia is still hungry.

But not even food could hold her attention from what happened next. She felt something poking at her right foot, and looked down, only to see the impossibly tiny bodies of her mom, dad, and bro trying to get her attention.
14112.title: Julia

choices: Her brother decides that, no, he will not just let this go
Julia and her brother head outside
141121.content:
Julia notices that they are trying to speak to her, but even in the quiet dining room of their upper middle-class house, she can barely hear them. Or maybe she can't because she's thinking of all the fun she gets to have now.

You see, Julia has always dreamed of having little humans to play with, even from a young age. Dolls and such never interested her, they couldn't respond, and pets were obviously not humans, and frankly too cute and helpless to bother. Her oddly specific toy request was one she never thought would be fulfilled...until now.

"Why is she smiling like that?" Julia's brother asked his parents.

Julia reached her right hand down, letting the three shrunken of her family get on, and transported them to the surface of the table.

"You guys are soooo small!" Julia teased, looking specifically at her brother, who up until now was always taller than her. She poked him so hard that he fell on his back. "Haha, cool."

"Young lady, this isn't any time to be playing around. You have to get us help!" Julia's father spoke up.

Julia looked at him like he was crazy, smirking, "I think you're confused as to what you are now." The young teenager pinched her father by the arm and hoisted him up, dropping him into the cereal. "Maybe you'd understand better like this."

Julia scooped up a big spoonful of cereal and milk, dangerously close to her dad's place in the bowl, and engulfed her catch within her mouth, slurping until nothing was left on the spoon.

"Ahh...you see? Just think if you were eaten just now. Wouldn't that be awful." Julia mentioned sarcastically, giggled and continued to eat. Her dad could not escape.

"Julia! Stop that right now! What the hell do you think he is? He is your father!" Julia's mother finally spoke up.

Julia looked back at her mom wide-eyed, spoon stuck in her mouth. She slipped the spoon out and back into the bowl. "Mother," Julia started exaggeratedly, "How dare you use that word in this house!" She picked up her mom the same way she did to her dad. "How will you be punished??" Julia tossed her mother in to the cereal too.

Her brother tried to run, he really did, but somehow, he realized that pissing off Julia would likely get him the same fate (even though it wouldn't, as of right now Julia only thinks that there are three shrunken people in the world, so she has to keep one). So he stayed. But he did not look. Only heard.

The two parents looked up into the cute face of their daughter, their child that they raised to be sweet and gentle. Kind and caring. Her blue eyes looked back down at them, showing none of these traits.

"Hey bro!" Julia said, lifting the bowl. "I'm about to eat mom and dad now. Okay?" Her brother said nothing.

Julia shrugged. "He thinks it's okay." She opened her mouth and poured in her parents along with a torrent of milk and soggy cereal bits. When the bowl was all good and empty, Julia shut her mouth, her cheeks puffing out due to the amount of food shoved in, and very noisily swallowed.

"Ahh...well, that's what they get for being assholes so early in the morning." Julia felt the lump of food travel down her throat and land softly in her stomach.

The parents did not stand a chance against their daughter's belly, gagging at the smell and disgusted by all the loud gurgles and glorps and rumblies and all sorts of noises. They were quickly squished by Julia's churning stomach into the other food mush, and mixed with stomach acid.

Julia got up, satisfyingly rubbling and patting her active tummy. Feeling a rise in her chest, Julia expression changed as she prepared for the air travelling up her throat. The young teenager burped loudly and forcefully, for a good three seconds. She smacked her tongue around her mouth, tasting something.

"Eww...puke and cereal." She laughed and put all the dishes in the sink. Then, she returned to her brother. She picked up his body and placed it on her shoulder. He was still fighting back his true emotions and trauma from the nightmarish scene that just unfolded before him.

"Come on bro--" Julia let out a tiny burp, a leftover of the big one, "We're gonna go see if everyone else's parents shrunk today."
141121.title: Julia has secretly waited for this day

You became dizzy and light headed as you fell down onto the floor. When you awoke, things seemed different. You were in some eerie white landscape. You looked around confused as your vision started to sharpen. Everything around you was huge. Impossibly huge. To your left, a bathtub towered at skyscraper heights. In front of you was the base of the sink, 50 foot wide and hundreds of feet tall.

"No way..." you mutter to yourself. You had shrunk to less than an inch tall. You start to panic. How did this happen? What could you do?

BOOM.

The shaking got worse.
